HelpText.database: returns the client database of the server
HelpText.lastseen: <ClientDbID> date the client was last seen on the server
HelpText.block: <IP> <Mode> Blocks ip from accessing server (Mode must be set to [in, out, full]
HelpText.unblock: <IP> Unblocks the ip from accessing server
HelpText.resetiptables: Clears all rules in the iptables
HelpText.r6rank: <Playername> Retrieves the RB6 Rank and MMR for one season
HelpText.r6ops: <Playername><Operatorname> Retrieves the RB6 stats for an Operator for an User
HelpText.pokespamf: like pokespam but cant be stoped!
HelpText.trollmovef: like trollmove but cant be stoped!
